children.subject: Anyone cal declare CS if they are willing to put a lot of effort into doing it. That being said, Data 8 is considered by most to be far easier than the 61 series so make sure to set aside a lot of time for those classes. If you have the time and energy, I say go for it.

history.content:
Hey everyone, I was just wondering how hard it is to get the minimum 3.3 gpa needed to declare computer science in cs 61a, 61b, and 70. I am a junior transfer in Haas and I want to declare computer science as a simultaneous degree. However, right now I am in Data 8 and EECS 16A and they are pretty challenging for me. How concerned should I be about being able to get the minimum gpa in those classes to declare?? Like if I put in the work can I count on it, or are those the type of classes where no matter how hard you try, you might still not get the outcome you want?? 

Thanks! 

Ps I had zero coding experience before data 8
history.subject: Difficulty in declaring CS
